description: System placeholder identifier for a merge field used in notifications or document templates (e.g., variables for asset, address, dates). Begins with $; used to substitute runtime values.

Code for the templateâ€™s business context or document type (e.g., work order, purchase order, work request). Used to group applicable fields; some codes may be system-specific (e.g., 'BF'); confirm with SME.
Human-readable label for the placeholder, shown to users when selecting or mapping fields in a template.
User or system account that created this template field definition for audit purposes.
Timestamp when this template field definition was created.
User or system account that last modified this template field definition.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this template field definition.
Display or processing order of the field within its template or section; lower numbers appear first.
